description: Leana Wen, a medical student from Washington University in St. Louis, and Will Okun, a teacher from Chicago, will travel with Times columnist Nick Kristof on a reporting trip to Africa.
title: Win a Trip With Nick Kristof
title_page: Win a Trip With Nick Kristof - Video - NYTimes.com
text: Leana Wen, a medical student from Washington University in St. Louis, and Will Okun, a teacher from Chicago, will travel with Times columnist Nick Kristof on a reporting trip to Africa.
